name: Silver Surfer: Prodigal Son
summary: The scientist Norrin Radd is transformed into the silver being who flies around on a surfboard. He decides to accept the responsibility of having to protect planet Earth after qiwan.cc learning that he had actually been tricked into helping the giant alien Galactus search for planets to feed on.
